hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're here to help you on your learning journey. Reach out to us anytime!

departments.name: Student Support
departments.description: Get help with courses, technical issues, and general inquiries

departments.name: Corporate Training

faq.question: How do I enroll in a course?
faq.answer: You can enroll in any course by creating an account, browsing our course catalog, and clicking the 'Enroll Now' button on your chosen course.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all our courses. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

faq.question: Are the certificates recognized by employers?
faq.answer: Our certificates are industry-recognized and valued by employers. Many of our graduates have successfully used them to advance their careers.

faq.question: Can I access courses on mobile devices?
faq.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. You can learn anywhere, anytime.

faq.question: Do you offer corporate training?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide custom corporate training solutions. Contact our corporate training team to discuss your organization's needs.
